CustomField.formula:
IF( In_Force__c, true,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Tail/Run Off"), TODAY() < Tail_Expiration_Date__c,TODAY() < Renewal_Date__c), true,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Tail/Run Off"), TODAY() < Tail_Expiration_Date__c,TODAY() > Renewal_Date__c), true,
IF( AND(
NOT(AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Tail/Run Off")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "BORed away")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Closed Lost")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Non-Renewed by Insured")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Cancelled by Insured")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Cancelled - Off Risk")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Cancelled - Nonpayment")), Today()> Renewal_Date__c )),
OR(ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Policy Delivered / Closed Won" ),ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "In Stamping / Accounting" )), TODAY() > Effective_Date__c, TODAY() > Renewal_Date__c,
AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Non-Renewed by Insured" )), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled by Insured" )), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled - Off Risk" )), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled - Nonpayment" )) ))
, true,
IF( AND(
NOT(AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Tail/Run Off")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "BORed away")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Closed Lost")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Non-Renewed by Insured")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Cancelled by Insured")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Cancelled - Off Risk")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Cancelled - Nonpayment")), Today()> Renewal_Date__c )),
OR(ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Policy Delivered / Closed Won" ),ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "In Stamping / Accounting" )), TODAY() < Effective_Date__c,
AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Non-Renewed by Insured" )), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled by Insured" )), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled - Off Risk" )), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled - Nonpayment" )) ))
,true,
IF( AND(ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "In Processing" ),ISBLANK(Renewal_Date__c)), true, false
))))))
CustomField.label: InForceCov
